price: Mu gihe rero mwogenza umugongo mukirengagiza Qor’ani n’inyigisho z’intumwa, mwoca mugenzwa n’ubwononyi bwo kugarariza no gusesa amaraso kw’isi, hamwe rero no guca ubuvandimwe bw’abo musangiye amaraso;
arabic: فَهَلۡ عَسَيۡتُمۡ إِن تَوَلَّيۡتُمۡ أَن تُفۡسِدُواْ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَتُقَطِّعُوٓاْ أَرۡحَامَكُمۡ

meta.transliteration: fahal ʿasaytum in tawallaytum an tuf'sidū fī al-arḍi watuqaṭṭiʿū arḥāmakum
